In your repo under /settings/pages<\/code> you can:<\/p>

    

  • configure which branch<\/code> will be serving the static files<\/li>

  • configure which folder will be serving the static files<\/li>
<\/ul>

    For the settings bellow, choose master<\/code> as the branch you want to use and the root folder /<\/code> as the folder you want to use.<\/p>

    Create a file .github/workflows/ssg-build.yml<\/code> with (assuming the branch main<\/code> will trigger a new deploy).<\/p>

    In the build section below, update the environment variables to build with the correct settings.<\/p>

      

    • NULLSTACK_PROJECT_NAME<\/code> - your project name<\/li>

    • NULLSTACK_PROJECT_DOMAIN<\/code> - domain, required to correctly render meta tags

        

      • if you have a custom domain you should also create a file public/CNAME<\/code> containing your domain name<\/li>
<\/ul><\/li>

      • NULLSTACK_PROJECT_COLOR<\/code> - color to show your application in when installing in devices<\/li>
<\/ul>
